title: RIP Dawn
author: VD
content_html:
Buffy the Vampire Slayer star Michelle Trachtenberg is dead at the age of 39. Causes not disclosed.

This one will hit GenX hard. Buffy wasn’t even that long ago, was it?

DISCUSS ON SG
